verses.text: And when \w any|strong="H5315"\w* will \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w meat|strong="H4503"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* shall be \add of\add* fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*; and he shall \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* upon it, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* thereon:

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it to \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: and he shall \w take|strong="H7061"\w* \w thereout|strong="H8033"\w* his \w handful|strong="H7062"\w* of the \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* thereof, and of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* thereof, with all the \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* thereof; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* of it upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \add to be\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And the \w remnant|strong="H3498"\w* of the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*: \add it is\add* a thing \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*.

¶ And if thou \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* an \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* of a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w baken|strong="H3989"\w* in the \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, \add it shall be\add* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, or \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w wafers|strong="H7550"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

¶ And if thy \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add baken\add* in a \w pan|strong="H4227"\w*, it shall be \add of\add* fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft in a pan: or, on a flat plate, or, slice\f*
Thou shalt \w part|strong="H6626"\w* it in \w pieces|strong="H6595"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* thereon: it \add is\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.

¶ And if thy \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add baken\add* in the \w fryingpan|strong="H4802"\w*, it shall be \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \add of\add* fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* that is \w made|strong="H6213"\w* of these things unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and when it is \w presented|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, he shall \w bring|strong="H5066"\w* it unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H7311"\w* from the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* a \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* thereof, and shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \add it is\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And that which is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*: \add it is\add* a thing \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*.

No meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, which ye shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, shall be \w made|strong="H6213"\w* with \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*: for ye shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* no \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w*, nor any \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, in any \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*.

¶ As for the \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w*, ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* them unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but they shall not be \w burnt|strong="H5927"\w* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*.\f + \fr 2.12 \ft be burnt: Heb. ascend\f*

And every \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* of thy meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* shalt thou \w season|strong="H4414"\w* with \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*; neither shalt thou suffer the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to be \w lacking|strong="H7673"\w* from thy meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: with all thine \w offerings|strong="H7133"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*.

And if thou \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of thy \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* for the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of thy \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* green \w ears|strong="H0024"\w* of corn \w dried|strong="H7033"\w* by the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add even\add* corn \w beaten|strong="H1643"\w* out of full \w ears|strong="H3759"\w*.
And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* upon it, and \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* thereon: it \add is\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* of it, \add part\add* of the beaten \w corn|strong="H1643"\w* thereof, and \add part\add* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* thereof, with all the \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* thereof: \add it is\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
